00025 #ifndef CALCLEVELSVISITOR_H
00026 #define CALCLEVELSVISITOR_H
00027 
00028 #include <assert.h>
00029 #include "Visitor.h"
00030 
00036 class CalcLevelsVisitor : public Visitor
00037 {
00038  public:
00042   CalcLevelsVisitor(int n) : currentLhs(NULL) {
00043     levels = new GrammarLevels(n);
00044   }
00049   void setLhs(NonTerminal *lhs) 
00050     { assert(lhs != NULL); currentLhs=lhs; }
00054   GrammarLevels * getLevels() 
00055     { assert(levels != NULL);  return levels; }
00056 
00057   void visitUnion(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00058     { rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00059   void visitConcat(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00060     { rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00061   void visitKleeneClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00062     { rp->accept(this); }
00063   void visitPositiveClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00064     { rp->accept(this); }
00065   void visitOption(RightPart *rp) 
00066     { rp->accept(this); }
00067   void visitEmpty() { ; }
00068   void visitTerminal(Terminal *) { ; }
00069 
00074   void visitNonTerminal(NonTerminal *nterm)  { 
00075     assert(currentLhs != NULL);  // Should have set this before visit!
00076     levels->setDerive(currentLhs, nterm);
00077   }
00078 
00079  private:
00080   CalcLevelsVisitor() {}    
00081   NonTerminal *currentLhs;  
00082   GrammarLevels * levels;   
00083 };
